house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1993 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s),Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Microwave, Pantry, Trash Compacter
